Combat
Hit Points: 268 Armor Class: 39 (dexterity (4 max); expert)
Armor: Leather Shield: Wooden (+2 AC when raised; hardness 3; HP 12) Weapons: Crossbow (+28 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Dagger (+28 1d4+4 P/S R10'; strength; expert); Staff (+28 1d4+4 B [2h d8]; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Armor Proficiency: Defense Trained (Heavy Armor)
Cloistered Cleric: Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Deadly Simplicity: +1 damage die step on Crossbow
Deity: Attack Trained (Crossbow)
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +4
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +4
Divine Defense: Defense Expert (Unarmored Defense)
Extend Armament Alignment: Increased Align Armament effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: +4
Toughness: +20 Hit Points
Unconventional Weaponry (Bastard Sword): Treats Bastard Sword as one category simpler
Warpriest: Defense Expert (Light Armor; Medium Armor)/Attack Trained (Martial Weapons)Attack Expert (Crossbow; Simple Weapons; Unarmed Attacks)
Align Armament (Lawful): (1) May touch a weapon to have it inflict +1d6 HP lawful for 1 min
Channel Smite: (2) May add the effects of Heal or Harm to a melee Strike
Cloistered Cleric: May use critical specialization effects of Crossbow
Incredible Improvisation: (F) May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/day
Replenishment Of War: Successful Strike with Crossbow gives self 10 temporary Hit Points (critical hit 20 temporary Hit Points) for 1 rd
Shared Replenishment: R10' May give temporary Hit Points from Replenishment Of War to an ally
Shield Block: (R) When shield is raised, may negate damage up to its hardness and have it absorb half of remaining damage
Warpriest: May use critical specialization effects of Crossbow
Weapon Specialization: +2/+3/+4 HP damage with expert/master/legendary weapon proficiency
Save: Fortitude: +30 (constitution; master); Reflex: +28 (dexterity; expert); Will: +31 (wisdom; master)
Save Notes:
Cloistered Cleric: Save Expert (Fortitude)
Lightning Reflexes: Save Expert (Reflex)
Resolve: Save Master (Will)
Warpriest: Save Master (Fortitude)
Breath Control: +1 vs. inhaled threats/Success vs. inhaled threat is always a critical success
Fast Recovery: Regains 2x Hit Points and drained severity from rest/Successful Fortitude vs. an ongoing disease or poison reduces its stage by 2, or 1 if virulent; critical success by 3, or 2 if virulent
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Resolve: Successes on Will saves are critical successes
Toughness: -1 DC on recovery checks
Warpriest: Successes on Fortitude saves are critical successes
Magic
Spell Slots: D0: 5; D10: 2; D1: 3; D2: 3; D3: 3; D4: 3; D5: 3; D6: 3; D7: 3; D8: 3; D9: 13 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Divine: +33 (wisdom; legendary) Spell DC: Divine: 43 (wisdom; legendary)
Spells:
Agile Feet (D1 Tra): Self gains +5 Speed and may ignore difficult terrain for the remainder of turn
Traveler's Transit (D4 Evo): FILL
Magic Notes:
Advanced Domain (Travel): Knows the Traveler's Transit spell/+1 Focus Points
Cloistered Cleric: Spell Legendary (Divine)
Domain Initiate (Travel): Knows the Agile Feet spell/Has a focus pool with 1 Focus Point
Harmful Font: +5 D9 slots
Healing Font: +5 D9 slots
Maker Of Miracles: +1 10th level spell slot
Miraculous Spell: Has 1 10th-level spell slot
Warpriest: Spell Master (Divine)
Avatar's Audience: May speak for deity, Commune without cost, and Plane Shift to deity 1/day
Cantrip Expansion: May prepare two additional cantrips each day
Cast Down: (1) May modify Harm or Heal to also inflict knocked prone (target critical fail also inflicts -10 Speed for 1 min)
Castigating Weapon: Damaging a fiend with Heal gives self weapons bonus good damage vs. fiends equal to half the spell level for 1 rd
Channeled Succor: May cast Remove Curse, Remove Disease, Remove Paralysis, or Restoration in place of a prepared Heal
Command Undead: (1) May use Harm to control undead up to level 17 for 1 min (Will neg; critical failure extends to 1 hour)
Communal Healing: Casting Heal on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Cremate Undead: Heal cast upon undead inflicts persistent fire damage equal to the spell level
Defensive Recovery: (1) May cast a single-target Heal that also gives +2 AC and saves for 1 rd
Deity's Protection: Casting a domain spell gives self resistance equal to the spell level to all damage for 1 rd
Deity: Has access to Illusory Object, Creation, Magnificent Mansion spells
Directed Channel: May cast an area Harm or Heal in a 60' cone
Divine Spellcasting: May learn spells from the divine tradition
Divine Weapon: (F) May cast a spell that also causes a wielded weapon to inflict +1d4 HP force or +1d6 HP alignment for the remainder of turn
Domain Focus: Refocus restores 2 Focus Points
Domain Wellspring: Refocus restores 3 Focus Points
Echoing Channel: (1) May have a 2-action, single-target Harm or Heal also cause 1-action effects on an adjacent creature
Emblazon Antimagic: May use Emblazon Armament on a shield to give a bonus on saves vs. magic and allow Shield Block vs. spells, or on a weapon to have a critical hit also counteract a spell using 1/2 the wielder's level
Emblazon Armament: 10 min process gives target shield +1 Hardness or weapon +1 HP damage
Emblazon Energy: May use Emblazon Armament on a shield to give a save bonus and Shield Block vs. chosen energy type, and having a matching domain spell also gives it +10 resistance; may use on a weapon to give it +1d4 HP chosen energy type, or +1d6 HP with a matching domain spell
Eternal Bane: R15' Surrounded by continuous level 10 Bane effects
Eternal Blessing: R15' Surrounded by continuous level 10 Bless effects
Fast Channel: May use 2 actions to cast a 3-action Harm or Heal
Harming Hands: Harm die type increases to d10
Healing Hands: Heal die type increases to d10
Heroic Recovery: (1) May cast a single-target Heal that also gives the target +5 Speed, +1 attack, and +1 HP damage for 1 rd
Holy Castigation: May use Heal to damage fiends
Improved Command Undead: Target success/failure/critical failure vs. Command Undead gives self control for 1 rd/10 min/24 hours
Improved Communal Healing: May give additional Hit Points from Communal Healing to another
Improved Swift Banishment: May sacrifice any 5th level or higher prepared spell to inflict Swift Banishment with a -2 save penalty
Metamagic Channel: (F) May apply a metamagic action to Harm and Heal
Necrotic Infusion: (1) Harm cast on an undead allows the target to inflict +1d6 negative HP (5th level spell +2d6 HP; 8th level +3d6 HP) with first melee Strike in next rd
Reach Spell: (1) May extend spell range by 30'
Resurrectionist: Restoring Hit Points to a dying or dead target also gives fast healing 5 for 1 min
Sap Life: Casting Harm on another creature restores Hit Points to self equal to the spell level
Selective Energy: May choose 4 creatures to be unaffected when casting an area Harm or Heal
Steady Spellcasting: A successful DC 15 flat check negates self spellcasting disruption
Swift Banishment: (R) May apply Banishment effects with a critical hit
Turn Undead: Critical failure by undead up to level 20 damaged by Heal inflicts fleeing for 1 rd
Versatile Font: May use a font slot to prepare either Harm or Heal
Notes
Validation Errors:
Class Feats Allocation: 11 available vs. 46 allocated
Cleric Divine Font Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Cleric Doctrine Allocation: 1 available vs. 2 allocated
Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Eternal Bane Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 16 and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Extend Armament Alignment Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 14 and align armament feature
Improved Command Undead Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 10, harmful font feature (currently 1), command undead feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
Necrotic Infusion Feat: Requires level (currently 20) >= 4, harmful font feature (currently 1) and alignment (currently Lawful Good) matches 'Evil'
